geopolitics.description: On 26 February, the Council of the European Union decided to extend the sanctions against Belarus for another year. The restrictive measures will remain in force to the same extent as until now, with no changes.

commodities.title: Gold, silver get bigger role as SEBI tweaks MF valuation rules: A hedge against global uncertainty and exchange rate volatility?
commodities.description: SEBI is set to change how mutual funds value gold and silver from April 1, 2026. Funds will use Indian stock exchange prices instead of LBMA. This allows more gold and silver in equity and hybrid schemes. Lifecycle funds can allocate 10% to gold and silver.
